title: Gene editing possible for kidney disease

title_detail.value: Gene editing possible for kidney disease

summary: For the first time scientists have identified how to halt kidney disease in a life-limiting genetic condition, which may pave the way for personalised treatment in the future.

summary_detail.value: For the first time scientists have identified how to halt kidney disease in a life-limiting genetic condition, which may pave the way for personalised treatment in the future.
